channel.title: Getting correct colors?
channel.description:
yea ok ive benn making models for like a month now, and whenevwer i finish the faces and try to pick the mat colors, i could never get the correct color
i feel like this problem messes up my whole model
can you guys share with me some tips on colorpicking, or maybe is there a tool to copy the same color from a picture?
i really appreciate the help
ALSO: im a little color blind so that might be the problem.
please state if anybody else has there problems

item.title: Getting correct colors?
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

oh ok thanks and i think the convergence from meta to datmaker, the colors are off on datmaker right?

Read full topic

item.title: Getting correct colors?
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

So the color you choose in the circle of colors Tends to be a little lighter. So if i choose tan in that circle, it will be brown on the model. So choose a color a little lighter than the color you actually want.

Read full topic
